subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: In the span of six years, the Angels, the Red Sox and the White Sox have all outlasted decades of gloom to win the World Series. Now comes the heavy lifting: The Cubbies.
snippet: In the span of six years, the Angels, the Red Sox and the White Sox have all outlasted decades of gloom to win the World Series. Now comes the heavy lifting: The Cubbies.
